meanings.definition: rushees (noun): individuals who are being rushed or recruited by a group or organization
meanings.sent1: The rushees were excited to join the club.
meanings.sent2: The rushees attended the recruitment event.
meanings.sent3: The rushees joked about being chased by the club members.
meanings.sent4: The rushees were like magnets to the organization.
meanings.sent5: The rushees felt the pull of belonging to the group.

meanings.definition: rushees (verb): the act of rushing or recruiting individuals to join a group or organization
meanings.sent1: The rushees happened quickly to get new members.
meanings.sent2: The rushees were successful in recruiting new members.
meanings.sent3: The rushees decided to rush for more participants.
meanings.sent4: The rushees were like busy bees gathering new members.
meanings.sent5: The rushees rushed with enthusiasm to grow the group.
